outputs.output_descr: National and provincial investment strategies are implemented to strengthen investment management systems for quality and sustainable growth in Lao PDR. Main activities are: capacity development and use of the investment database, and support to field testing and refinement of the investment monitoring framework.

project_descr: Poverty-Environment Initiative Phase 2 Lao PDR, Investment Management Component
project_title: Poverty-Environment Initiative Phase 2, Invest. Mngt Com
